name: AllClassical
0:
”Alexa, open all classical”
”Alexa, play all classical”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: all classical
des: By requesting All Classical, the user can access 24 hours of non-commercial, classical music radio and fine arts information broadcast from Portland, Oregon. All Classical Radio is an independent, community-funded radio station and multimedia platform with international reach, providing access to classical music, outstanding performances, and engaging storytelling since 1983.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
